thread.section_title: Munich Ski Shuttle Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von Munich Ski Shuttle | www.munich-ski-shuttle.com | 2 von 10
thread.title: Kylie
thread.title_full: Munich Ski Shuttle bewertet von Kylie

author: Kylie
title: Kylie
text: Our Experience with Munich Ski Shuttle was great - the price was very competitive, the car was lovely (and stocked with free water), emails were responded to promptly and they even changed the pick up point for us the morning of. The highlight was definitely the driver Pascal though. He was so lovely, told us all about the areas we were driving through, things to do and see around our drop off point, info on how to get to our next location. A+ Service!
